For me, as your current instructor, your
achievements and the old scars engraved on your
body are my greatest pride.

MsgJp:
こたびの戦いの戦果に応じた報酬を配布中だ
防衛に参加してくれた全ての者は受け取ってくれ

We are currently distributing rewards based on
the results of the battle.
Please make sure to claim your rewards if you
participated in the defense.

MsgJp:
報酬は出たけれど、これじゃぁまだ姉さんに
報告するわけにはいかないなぁ

I received the rewards, but I can't report to my
sister like this.

MsgJp:
いくら稼いだんだ？
俺にも少しくらい分けてくれよ

How much did you earn?
Could you at least give me a little bit too?

MsgJp:
報酬はもう受け取ったのか？
お前の活躍、嬉しいんだけど副隊長の注目が
集まると思うと複雑なんだよなぁ――
MsgEn:
Have you already received your rewards?
I'm happy about your achievements, but I can't
help feeling conflicted when the vice captain's
attention is drawn to you.

MsgEn: Stay calm and finish them off!

MsgJp: この調子で駆け抜けるぞ！

MsgJp: よくやった、付いてこい！

MsgJp:

MsgJp: よし、次だ
